title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB:
The dynamic text element does not properly display the db field contents which have three types of content:
1) HTML text within <html ...</html> tag.
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag.
3) Text with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set up a db field with the three types of content as mentioned.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
